title: Multiplying Each Root
speech: 6, the square root of 2 x squared end root times 8, the square root of 45 x to the fourth end root   is equal to   48, the square root of 90 x to the sixth end root

title: Simplifying the Product
speech: the square root of 90 x to the sixth end root is equal to 3 x cubed the square root of 10 , so we have  48 times 3 x cubed the square root of 10 is equal to, 144 x cubed the square root of 10
